analysis.key_quote: I oppose the creation of the Schedule Policy/Career as a new category of Excepted Service under 5 CFR Part 213. Career civil servants should not be subject to political manipulation and interference.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization of civil service and the erosion of merit-based protections. It emphasizes the importance of scientific integrity and due process, which align with the themes opposing the rule.
